overview:
San Jose Criminal Defense Attorney Nick Cvietkovich aggressively defends his clients facing criminal charges. With over 3000 cases in his career, Nick Cvietkovich uses his vast experience to protect you against DUI, theft, drug, gang, battery, assault, and all criminal matters.

When you need to be sure that you are getting the very best legal representation, and not some fly-by-night lawyer who is only interested in settling your case as soon as possible, trust the experts at the Law Offices of Nick Cvietkovich to do everything in their power to get the best possible ruling on your case.
